title: GCE Kannur: Courses, Admission, Fees, Result
meta_description: Government College of Engineering - [GCE], Kannur, Kerala Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, B.Tech, M.Tech, Ph.D . 14 Courses. Average Fees is 9710 per year.

Section.name: About GCE Kannur
Section.description:
Govt. College of Engineering Kannur was established in 1986 as a centre for imparting quality engineering education in northern Kerala. It is affiliated to Kannur University. The college is functioning in a large 75-acre unified academic complex, having sound and self-sufficient infrastructure. It is recognized by AICTE.
